price.title: How much does the subscription cost?
price.body: At the moment, the subscription price is 2000 rubles per month.

purchase.title: How to get in?
purchase.body: Follow the posts on social networks, where we notify about future restocks.

monitors.title: What monitors do you have?
monitors.body: We have custom monitors for electronics and sneakers.

resell.title: Can i resell my membership?
resell.body: No, it's a violation of our rules.

contacts.title: How can I contact you?
contacts.body: We are ready to answer all your questions through our VK page.

refound.title: Can i get a refund?
refound.body: No, the possibility of a refund is excluded.
